description: Make sure to cut the carrots and red peppers into the same size julienne (julienne are thin strips) so that they cook at the same rate Both of these vegetables keep well in the refrigerator, so this should be a dish you can pull together easily.
title: Stir-fried Tofu With Carrots and Red Peppers
title_page: Stir-fried Tofu With Carrots and Red Peppers Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
Make sure to cut the carrots and red peppers into the same size julienne (julienne are thin strips) so that they cook at the same rate. Both of these vegetables keep well in the refrigerator, so this should be a dish you can pull together easily.
Featured in: End Of Summer Stir Fries.
